original_title: Kandana Police Anti-Vice OIC arrested while accepting bribe
original_body_lines: The Officer-In-Charge (OIC) of the Kandana Police Anti-Vice Unit has been arrested by Bribery Commission officers while soliciting a bribe.
The Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC) stated that the police officer was arrested while accepting a bribe of Rs. 75,000 from a hotel owner in Kandana.
He has reportedly demanded a bribe of Rs. 100,000 for the relevant hotel to be operated without any interference from the police.
The arrest has been carried out by the officers of Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption.
